form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT ON BEHALf OF APPLICANTS FOR IMMIGRANT VISA

full_text: AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT ON BEHALF OF APPLICANTS FOR IMMIGRANT VISA STATE OF CALIFORNIA SS: CITY AND COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES) I, Elizabeth Hyppolite , being duly sworn according to law, depose and say as follows: 1. That I reside at 4816 W. 21st St., Los Angeles 16, California ; 2. That I make this affidavit for the purpose of facilitating the entry into the United States as immigrant (s) of the following alien(s) : NAME ADDRESS (1) Genia Lauture 616 W. 113 St., , New York, N. Y. (2) (3) (4) RELATIONSHIP TO AFFIANT (if none, nature of interest in alien) (1) mother (2) (3) (4) 3. That I am willing and able to receive the alien(s) after her (their) entry into the United States as immigrant (s) and to guarantee thats he (they) will not become a public charge on the Government of the United States or any sub- division thereof for conditions that may exist at the time of h er (their) entry; 4. That I was born in Jacmel, Haiti on 4-4-34 and that I am a citizen of Haiti 5. (if alien) That I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on 2-14-60 at New York, N. Y. and that my Alien Register number is: FOIA (b)(6) 6. That I was naturalized at not applicable on and that my Naturalization Certificate number is 7. That I am employed by Los Angeles County General Hospital in the capacity of registered nurse 8. That my annual income is $ 6060.00 and in addition I have the follow- ing resources: Bank savings $ 960.00 Credit Union Savings Account Real estate, value ($) 9 assessed at $ which is free of encumbrance except for # Other assets: 8. That proof of my income and resources is attached hereto as follows: Letter from my employer- 1962 income tax returns- Letter from Credit Union- Form I-550 9. That the following persons are dependent upon me for their sole or principal means of support: NAME RELATIONSHIP AGE FOIA (b)(6) Marie Cecile sister 15 FOIA (b) (6) Subscribed and sworn to before me this 22nd day of Judy in the year 196 3. Esther Studhay Affiant Notary Public ESTHER SHEEHAN MV Commission Expires June 27, 1966
